description: A dangerous island in the New World that was the site of a devastating weapon experiment, now split between fire and ice. It serves as Caesar Clown's laboratory.

keyEvents.title: Luffy-Law Alliance Formed
keyEvents.description: The historic pirate alliance between Monkey D. Luffy and Trafalgar Law is officially formed on Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: Punk Hazard becomes the birthplace of one of the most important alliances in One Piece history.

keyEvents.title: Smiley's Rampage Begins
keyEvents.description: Caesar's deadly pet Smiley appears on Punk Hazard and begins its deadly rampage, releasing poison gas.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the danger level on the island and creates urgency for all parties present.

keyEvents.title: G-5 Marines vs Smiley
keyEvents.description: The G-5 Marine unit encounters and must flee from Smiley outside Caesar's laboratory.
keyEvents.significance: Forces Marines to consider working with pirates due to the common threat.

statusHistory.reason: Island is active as Caesar's laboratory and the site of the Punk Hazard arc
